{{also|利湿药}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=利湿药|t2=利溼藥}}

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=lìshīyào
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# "Dampness-eliminating" ''[[w:Materia medica|materia medica]]'' in [[traditional Chinese medicine]]. It refers to herbs and other medicinal substances that are used to eliminate "dampness" in the body. Symptoms of "dampness" include water-retention in the limbs.
